description:
Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

macOS Sequoia 15.0 release notes

About the security content of macOS Sequoia 15.0

This update provides important bug fixes, including:
  • Messages may unexpectedly quit when replying to a message with a shared Apple Watch face.
  • Improves compatibility with third-party security software.

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

macOS Sequoia 15.1 release notes

About the security content of macOS Sequoia 15.1

This update provides important security fixes and is recommended for all users.

Refer to Apple's webpage for information about the security content of this update:

About the security content of macOS Sequoia 15.1.1

Refer to Apple's webpages for information about this release:

macOS Sequoia 15.2 release notes

About the security content of macOS Sequoia 15.2

This update introduces Genmoji, powered by Apple Intelligence, and also includes other enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates. They include:
  • Genmoji creation in Messages and other apps
  • Calculator repeats the last mathematical operation when you click the equal sign again
  • Easily manage settings for notification summaries from the Lock Screen (Mac with Apple silicon)
  • Updated style for summarized notifications better distinguishes them from other notifications by using italicized text as well as the glyph (Mac with Apple silicon)
  • Notification summaries for News & Entertainment apps are temporarily unavailable, and users who opt-in will see them again when the feature becomes available (Mac with Apple silicon)
Refer to Apple's webpage for information about the security content of this update:

This update provides important security fixes and is recommended for all users.

About the security content of macOS Sequoia 15.4.1

This update includes enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates, including:
  • Parents now receive a notification when the Screen Time passcode is used on a child's device

This update provides important bug fixes and security updates and is recommended for all users.
